body_html:
I can reproduce the problem on Linux, and I asked the author of that change to take a look.

(We don't have any continuous builds for the combination of XLA enabled and GPU disabled, which is why no-one noticed.)

The easiest workaround would be to install the CUDA libraries and build with GPU enabled. You don't actually need to have a GPU to do this.

body:
I can reproduce the problem on Linux, and I asked the author of that change to take a look.

(We don't have any continuous builds for the combination of XLA enabled and GPU disabled, which is why no-one noticed.)

The easiest workaround would be to install the CUDA libraries and build with GPU enabled. You don't actually need to have a GPU to do this.
